l7:ResourceSet.l7:Resource: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy"> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="Used at two positions within the clientstore policy"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required"> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:ComparisonAssertion> <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/> <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${request.http.parameter.scope}"/> <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/> <L7p:FailIfVariableNotFound booleanValue="false"/> <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/> <L7p:Predicates predicates="included"> <L7p:item binary="included"> <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/> <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/> <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/> </L7p:item> </L7p:Predicates> </L7p:ComparisonAssertion> <L7p:SetVariable> <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="b29i"/> <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="scope"/> </L7p:SetVariable> </wsp:All> <L7p:SetVariable> <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXF1ZXN0Lmh0dHAucGFyYW1ldGVyLnNjb3BlfQ=="/> <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="scope"/> </L7p:SetVariable> <L7p:assertionComment> <L7p:Properties mapValue="included"> <L7p:entry> <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/> <L7p:value stringValue="handle optional scope"/> </L7p:entry> </L7p:Properties> </L7p:assertionComment> </wsp:OneOrMore> <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required"> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:ComparisonAssertion> <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/> <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${request.http.parameter.environment}"/> <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/> <L7p:FailIfVariableNotFound booleanValue="false"/> <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/> <L7p:Predicates predicates="included"> <L7p:item binary="included"> <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/> <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/> <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/> </L7p:item> </L7p:Predicates> </L7p:ComparisonAssertion> <L7p:SetVariable> <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="QUxM"/> <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="environment"/> </L7p:SetVariable> </wsp:All> <L7p:SetVariable> <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXF1ZXN0Lmh0dHAucGFyYW1ldGVyLmVudmlyb25tZW50fQ=="/> <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="environment"/> </L7p:SetVariable> <L7p:assertionComment> <L7p:Properties mapValue="included"> <L7p:entry> <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/> <L7p:value stringValue="handle optional environment"/> </L7p:entry> </L7p:Properties> </L7p:assertionComment> </wsp:OneOrMore> <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required"> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:ComparisonAssertion> <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/> <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${request.http.parameter.callback}"/> <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/> <L7p:FailIfVariableNotFound booleanValue="false"/> <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/> <L7p:Predicates predicates="included"> <L7p:item binary="included"> <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/> <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/> <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/> </L7p:item> </L7p:Predicates> </L7p:ComparisonAssertion> <L7p:SetVariable> <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="b29i"/> <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="callback"/> </L7p:SetVariable> </wsp:All> <L7p:SetVariable> <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXF1ZXN0Lmh0dHAucGFyYW1ldGVyLmNhbGxiYWNrfQ=="/> <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="callback"/> </L7p:SetVariable> <L7p:assertionComment> <L7p:Properties mapValue="included"> <L7p:entry> <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/> <L7p:value stringValue="handle optional callback"/> </L7p:entry> </L7p:Properties> </L7p:assertionComment> </wsp:OneOrMore> </wsp:All> </wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy"> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="Deletes all expired tokens from oauth_token and oauth_initiate"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required"> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:JdbcQuery> <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included"> <L7p:Properties mapValue="included"> <L7p:entry> <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/> <L7p:value stringValue="Delete expired temporary tokens"/> </L7p:entry> </L7p:Properties> </L7p:AssertionComment> <L7p:AssertionFailureEnabled booleanValue="false"/> <L7p:ConnectionName stringValue="OAuth"/> <L7p:SqlQuery stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[delete from oauth_initiate where expiration < ${now.millis}]]></L7p:SqlQuery> </L7p:JdbcQuery> <L7p:JdbcQuery> <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included"> <L7p:Properties mapValue="included"> <L7p:entry> <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/> <L7p:value stringValue="Delete all entries with expired refresh tokens"/> </L7p:entry> </L7p:Properties> </L7p:AssertionComment> <L7p:AssertionFailureEnabled booleanValue="false"/> <L7p:ConnectionName stringValue="OAuth"/> <L7p:SqlQuery stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[DELETE FROM oauth_token WHERE rtoken IS NOT NULL AND rexpiration < ${now.millis}]]></L7p:SqlQuery> <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="persist"/> </L7p:JdbcQuery> <L7p:JdbcQuery> <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included"> <L7p:Properties mapValue="included"> <L7p:entry> <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/> <L7p:value stringValue="Delete expired access tokens"/> </L7p:entry> </L7p:Properties> </L7p:AssertionComment> <L7p:AssertionFailureEnabled booleanValue="false"/> <L7p:ConnectionName stringValue="OAuth"/> <L7p:SqlQuery stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[delete from oauth_token where expiration < ${now.millis} and rtoken is null]]></L7p:SqlQuery> </L7p:JdbcQuery> </wsp:All> <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion> <L7p:Detail stringValue="Could not delete expired tokens from the token store"/> <L7p:Level stringValue="WARNING"/> </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion> </wsp:OneOrMore> </wsp:All> </wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy"> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:Comment stringValue="Deletes all expired sessions from oauth_session"/> </L7p:CommentAssertion> <L7p:SetVariable> <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/> <L7p:DataType variableDataType="dateTime"/> <L7p:DateOffsetExpression stringValue=""/> <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="now"/> </L7p:SetVariable> <L7p:JdbcQuery> <L7p:AssertionFailureEnabled booleanValue="false"/> <L7p:ConnectionName stringValue="OAuth"/> <L7p:QueryName stringValue="Delete expired sessions"/> <L7p:SqlQuery stringValue="delete from oauth_session where expiration <= ${now.millis};"/> <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="deleteExpired"/> </L7p:JdbcQuery> <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion> <L7p:Detail stringValue="${deleteExpired.queryresult.count} expired sessions deleted."/> </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion> <L7p:ExportVariables> <L7p:ExportedVars stringArrayValue="included"> <L7p:item stringValue="deleteExpired.queryresult.count"/> </L7p:ExportedVars> </L7p:ExportVariables> </wsp:All> </wsp:Policy>

l7:PolicyDetail.l7:Name: OAuth Client Token Store Context Variables
